articles.title: Crazy way Amazon plans to change deliveries
articles.summary: Amazon is testing smart delivery glasses equipped with AI-powered vision, cameras, and a heads-up display in the US to enhance delivery efficiency and safety. These glasses, being trialled before a potential global rollout including Australia, assist drivers with package scanning, navigation, and hazard detection, eliminating the need for phones. The glasses also feature a controller with emergency services access and a vest for delivery verification.

articles.title: OPPO unveils A6 Pro with smart innovation
articles.author: Justice Okamgba
articles.summary: OPPO has launched the OPPO A6 Pro smartphone in Lagos, Nigeria, emphasizing its power, durability, and design. The A6 Pro features a 7,000 mAh battery, IP69 water and dust protection, a 120Hz AMOLED display, and is available in 8GB+128GB and 8GB+256GB models.

articles.title: I'm drowning in AI features I never asked for and I absolutely hate it
articles.author: Raghav Sethi
articles.summary: Google replaced Assistant with Gemini, aiming for a smarter experience, but users found it less effective and reverted to the older version. Similarly, Apple's Siri worsened with the introduction of Apple Intelligence. Microsoft's Copilot is now heavily integrated into Windows, and the web browser Arc introduced Dia, and its successor, which prioritizes AI functionality.

articles.title: WPP expands AI reach for brands with Open Pro
articles.author: Makayla Muscat
articles.summary: WPP has launched WPP Open Pro, an AI-powered marketing platform designed to help brands create large volumes of on-brand content and rapidly deploy assets at scale. The platform brings together planning, content creation, and campaign publishing into a single interface.

articles.title: Schaeffer's Oil upgrades gasoline engine oils to API SQ with improved performance, new products and branding
articles.summary: Schaeffer's Oil has launched its upgraded SynShield® Gasoline Oils, featuring new formulations for hybrid and high-mileage engines. The SynShield® series replaces the Supreme 7000 and 9000 brands, offering enhanced engine protection and performance under diverse driving conditions. These oils are now available through Schaeffer's factory-direct reps and partnered retailers.

articles.title: LG JOINS 'SDVERSE' TO ACCELERATE SOFTWARE-DEFINED MOBILITY INNOVATION
articles.author: Cadillac News
articles.summary: LG has introduced AlphaWare Suite and other mobility solutions to the SDVerse Marketplace. This suite supports automakers and suppliers in the transition to the software-defined vehicle era.

articles.title: Can A $80 Toothbrush Reduce Waste? One UK-Based Startup Is Hoping So.
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Suri, a London-based startup, is introducing its plant-based electric toothbrush to the US market. The product is debuting at Target, aiming to test mainstream consumer interest in sustainable oral hygiene options.

articles.title: Why Your Swiffer Is Leaving Your Kitchen Floors Sticky - And How To Fix It
articles.author: Kat Olvera
articles.summary: Procter & Gamble introduced Swiffer in 1999, but the cleaning solution can leave a sticky film on floors due to its alkaline nature. Users can mitigate this by using less solution, creating their own with dish soap and water, or rinsing the floors afterward. The Swiffer Wet Jet cleaning solutions should not be used on certain floor types like marble, unfinished, oiled, or waxed floors.

articles.title: Premium Clean Opens Doors For Entrepreneurs Nationwide Amidst Cleaning Boom
articles.summary: Premium Clean, a cleaning service provider in New Zealand, is launching a major expansion of its franchise network due to increased demand for professional cleaning services. The company offers a franchise system with complete training, guaranteed leads, and advanced technology to support new business owners. The expansion aims to provide motivated entrepreneurs the opportunity to own and operate franchises in prime territories.

articles.title: JD releases next generation balers
articles.author: Dairy News Australia
articles.summary: John Deere introduced its next generation of round balers. These balers are designed to deliver superior performance, intelligent connectivity, and premium quality bales for Australian farmers.

articles.title: Purekure Processes 100 Orders in Three Weeks with Chemical-Free Vegan Skincare Appealing to Clean Beauty Advocates
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: The company launched a genuinely organic and effective skincare product without harsh chemicals or alcohols. The first 100 customers are experiencing the difference that clean formulations make for skin health.

articles.title: AI fatigue is real: why Australian consumers want less machine, more meaning
articles.author: Ori Gold
articles.summary: Several companies, including amaysim, Peter Alexander and The ICONIC, have experimented with AI in marketing. Coca-Cola launched the 'Create Real Magic' campaign, inviting fans to co-create artwork using AI, generating buzz and consumer engagement. However, Coca-Cola's later AI-generated Christmas campaign faced criticism for lacking emotional connection, highlighting the importance of a human touch in AI-driven marketing.

articles.title: IDEAL Shower Doors Offers Expedited Frameless Glass Solutions in Danvers, MA
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: IDEAL Shower Doors is now offering expedited service options for homeowners seeking bathroom transformations. The Danvers team is streamlining its process to provide faster turnaround times for luxury-level glass installations.

articles.title: Alibaba bets on AI chatbots to catch up with ByteDance, Tencent
articles.author: Shubhangi Chowdhury
articles.summary: Alibaba has launched a new AI chatbot assistant within its Quark app, offering free text and voice chat with real-time information and services. Additionally, pre-sales for Alibaba's Quark AI Glasses, priced at 4,699 yuan ($660), are starting on Tmall, with shipping planned for December. The glasses aim to offer AI assistance and interactive experiences to compete with Meta's smart glasses.

articles.title: Netflix Goes 'All In' on AI to 'Enhance' Content Creation
articles.author: Breitbart
articles.summary: Netflix is introducing generative AI across its streaming platform. This implementation aims to improve various aspects of its service.

articles.title: Viral TV with wheels, touchscreen finally $102 off: ‘Biggest treat' that ‘travels all over our home'
articles.author: Ashley Palya
articles.summary: LG's StanbyME, a 27-inch touch-screen smart TV on wheels, is available for $896.99 at Walmart. This portable entertainment hub features a Full HD display, a7 Gen5 Processor, webOS, and a rechargeable battery offering up to 3 hours of wireless viewing. Customers praise its portability, high-quality display, and versatility for use in various locations and activities.

articles.title: Liberty launches network guarantee along with a newly improved version of Smart Wi-Fi
articles.author: Criticologos
articles.summary: Liberty has launched a new network guarantee offering a 30-day money-back satisfaction promise for new customers. Alongside this, they've introduced an improved version of their WowFi internet service featuring Smart Wi-Fi technology. This technology provides faster speeds, increased capacity, and better signal penetration, with a new router that includes a built-in agent for optimized Wi-Fi connection.

articles.title: How to Choose the Right AI Customer Service Provider for Your Support Team
articles.author: Supplied
articles.summary: CoSupport AI allows companies to quickly onboard AI customer service solutions using existing FAQs and ticket history, requiring no engineering. A digital retail brand uses AI to resolve over 70 percent of "Where is my order?" requests, and a B2B SaaS company deploys an AI writing assistant that drafts 80 percent of agent replies. AI reduces costs not by replacing people but by increasing team efficiency.

articles.title: Prince St. Pizza to serve up SoHo Squares on Henderson Avenue
articles.author: Madelyn Edwards
articles.summary: Prince St. Pizza, a New York City-originated chain, is opening its first Texas location on October 24th. The new restaurant, located on N. Henderson Ave., will offer lunch, dinner, late night, catering, and in-location dining, featuring pizzas like 'The Original Prince,' 'The Naughty Pie,' and 'Spicy Vodka' with handcrafted sauces.

articles.title: Kloudspot's LISA Physical AI Platform Now Available on Google Cloud Marketplace
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Kloudspot has launched its LISA Physical AI platform on the Google Cloud Marketplace after completing the Google Cloud ISV Startup Springboard program. This AI SaaS solution aims to improve operational efficiency, safety, and revenue generation for complex spaces using various data sources and proprietary physical AI models. The collaboration with Google Cloud allows Kloudspot to leverage Google's AI portfolio and scale.

articles.title: Ledger Launches Nano Gen5 and Introduces Ledger Signers with Enterprise Multisig Support
articles.author: Crypto Economy
articles.summary: Ledger launched its Ledger Nano Gen5, the first of its devices rebranded as Signers. The Nano Gen5 focuses on authorizing signatures and protecting identities and features an E Ink display, NFC, and Bluetooth connectivity.

articles.title: Meltwater 2025 Year-End Product Release Delivers Smarter Media Intelligence with New AI Innovations
articles.author: Business Ghana
articles.summary: Meltwater announced its 2025 Year-End Product Release. This release introduces new AI tools. These AI tools are designed to provide PR and Marketing professionals with enhanced clarity and agility.

articles.title: 'Best advent calendar' that's sold out for 3 years bags £935 of products for £89
articles.author: Rachael Davis
articles.summary: Avant Skincare is launching the Wonders Advent Calendar for 2025, which includes 12 skincare products valued at £935, sold for £99. The calendar features the Pro-Intense Hyaluronic Acid Illuminating Day Cream, winner of the Vegan Beauty Awards, and introduces a new augmented reality experience. Additionally, Avant has hidden Golden Tickets inside selected calendars.

articles.title: WunderKind Launches: The Bedtime Stories App That Turns Every Child into the Hero — Just in Time for Halloween
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: WunderKind has launched a new storytelling app that uses AI to generate personalized storybooks, placing children as the heroes. The app is available on the App Store in the United States, Canada, United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, and Philippines and recently released a special Halloween collection featuring five original stories.

articles.title: FastBots.ai Reaches 73,000 Users as Small Businesses Turn to AI for Customer Service
articles.author: Fast Bots
articles.summary: FastBots.ai announced feature updates, including live chat with human handover and multi-channel support across WhatsApp, Instagram, Facebook, Telegram, and Slack. The platform also introduced multi-LLM testing, allowing users to compare AI model performance. These updates aim to enhance customer communication and provide businesses with more comprehensive AI chatbot solutions.

articles.title: Rubrik launches Agent Cloud to help enterprises deploy AI agents securely
articles.author: DHNS
articles.summary: A company has introduced a product designed to address key challenges in enterprise AI transformation. This product balances innovation with the risks associated with agentic AI systems, such as hallucinations and unauthorized actions, and mitigates potential misuse by threat actors.

articles.title: Anthropic's Claude chatbot is getting a ‘memory' upgrade
articles.author: Robert Hart
articles.summary: Anthropic is rolling out a 'memory' feature update for its Claude chatbot, enabling it to remember past conversations without prompting. This upgrade, initially available to Team and Enterprise users since September, is now being extended to Max subscribers and Pro subscribers, and allows users to manage and control what Claude remembers. The new feature aims to reduce the friction of starting over and bring Claude closer in line with rival chatbots like ChatGPT and Gemini.

articles.title: Alibaba unveils free AI chatbot service on Quark app
articles.author: Attia Naveed
articles.summary: Alibaba has launched a new AI chatbot assistant within its Quark app, supporting both text and voice interactions and powered by the Qwen3 models. Additionally, pre-sales for Alibaba's new Quark AI Glasses, priced at 4,699 yuan ($659), will begin on Tmall.

articles.title: Dakota Johnson : Charli XCX pourrait rejoindre le casting de son premier long métrage, A Tree Is Blue
articles.author: Margot Blaise
articles.summary: An apparel company aims to promote its new line of high-end baby clothes. They are partnering with an agency to target wealthy, young parents through targeted advertising within partner apps.

articles.title: InventHelp Inventor Develops New Adult Diaper (NJR-311)
articles.author: Invent Help
articles.summary: An inventor from Edison, N.J., created a new adult diaper called "S U C D" to protect incontinent individuals against wetness and discomfort. The diaper is designed to channel urine out to keep the user dry and comfortable.

articles.title: Amazon launches new AI shopping tool in US for the indecisive
articles.author: Straits Times
articles.summary: A new feature called 'Help Me Decide' automatically appears at the top of a product detail page. This feature is designed to assist users in making purchasing decisions.

articles.title: AI, data & cloud in focus as South African business, technology leaders gather
articles.author: AMA
articles.summary: SAP introduced its latest cloud applications and data-driven AI innovations, SAP Business Data Cloud and SAP Business AI, at the SAP Business Suite Innovation Day. These new AI and data solutions aim to provide real-time, context-rich insights to businesses by breaking down data silos and improving data governance. These will improve productivity, modernize data, and accelerate the development of intelligent applications.

articles.title: Pourquoi la visite du roi Charles III et de la reine Camilla au Vatican est historique ?
articles.author: Séraphine Roger
articles.summary: An apparel company is promoting its new line of high-end baby clothes. The company is working with an agency to create profiles of wealthy, young parents to target advertising within partner apps.

articles.title: Stock investing feature added to Maya app
articles.author: Earl John Alfaro
articles.summary: MAYA Philippines Inc. has launched Maya Stocks, a new feature within its app that allows subscribers to participate in initial public offerings (IPOs). Users can subscribe through partner brokers such as DragonFi Securities Inc., F. Yap Securities Inc. (2TradeAsia) and Philstocks Financial Inc., with Maya serving as the channel for account opening and funding, simplifying the IPO process.

articles.title: HONOR X7d wins over water in a splashing launch, still available for pre-order with an exciting freebie!
articles.author: --Ppa-Color-Scheme
articles.summary: HONOR Philippines launched the water-resistant AI smartphone HONOR X7d on October 22, 2025. The device boasts a 6500mAh battery, 5-year durability, and AI capabilities, including an AI button and MagicOS 9.0. It is available in multiple colors and storage options, with prices ranging from ₱7,299 to ₱9,999.

articles.title: Sridhar Vembu\u0026#039;s Zoho launches UPI app, integrated with Arattai, it has features like...; check details
articles.author: DNA India
articles.summary: Zoho has launched a new unified payments interface (UPI) app.

articles.title: New AI browsers could usher in a web where agents do our bidding—eventually
articles.author: Mark Sullivan
articles.summary: OpenAI has officially entered the browser market with the launch of its new ChatGPT Atlas browser, designed to enhance internet usage with AI capabilities. Google is also updating its Chrome browser with AI features powered by Gemini, including content summarization and tab organization, but takes a different approach by integrating them into an existing browser rather than building an AI-first browser from scratch.

articles.title: Scholars' Perspectives: Whether in calm waters or stormy seas, China will always forge ahead by fostering new quality productive forces: Justin Yifu Lin
articles.summary: China is strategically prioritizing the development of 'new quality productive forces' across emerging industries like new energy vehicles (NEVs), artificial intelligence (AI), robotics, and future sectors such as quantum computing and nuclear fusion. Simultaneously, traditional industries are undergoing transformation through digital and green technologies. This initiative aims to foster innovation, upgrade industries, and enhance China's economic resilience.

articles.title: Shows for Hosers! New Metric Media Launches YouTube Comedy Channel 'shozerTV'
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: New Metric Media launched shozerTV, a new YouTube comedy channel. This channel will feature Canadian and international comedy, including original and acquired series, podcasts, stand-up specials, and sketch content.

articles.title: Amazon's latest attempt at selling stuff with AI is the ‘Help me decide' button
articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.summary: Amazon is launching a new AI-powered tool called 'Help me decide' button on its app and mobile website. This tool suggests products to users based on their browsing activity, searches, shopping history, and preferences, aiming to enhance product selection and encourage purchases. The feature is rolling out to millions of users in the US, offering recommendations and alternative 'budget pick' or 'upgrade option'.

articles.title: Jason's Sourdough launches ready-to-heat toasties into Tesco
articles.author: Alicia Khan
articles.summary: Jason's Sourdough has introduced two new ready-to-heat toasties: Ham Hock & West Country Cheddar and Tangy & Mature Three Cheese, available in 355 Tesco stores. These toasties, made on Jason's White Sourdough Ciabattin bread, are inspired by the brand's earlier foodservice launch and cater to consumer demand for high-quality, ready-to-eat options.

articles.title: Lubrizol Launches New Zinc-Free Hydraulic Additive for Enhanced Environmental Protection
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Lubrizol launched Lubrizol® AH933ZF, a zinc-free additive package designed for robust performance and user benefits. This innovation caters to the increasing demand for zinc-free hydraulic fluids in environmentally sensitive applications.

articles.title: Alloy.ai Announces Lens - an Agentic AI Analyst for Consumer Goods Companies
articles.summary: Alloy.ai launched Lens, an AI analyst designed for consumer brands that helps CPGs in decision making within seconds. Lens uses Alloy.ai's data integration platform to analyze sales trends, inventory, supply chain and forecasting and is available for demo at Alloy.ai/lens-ai-analyst.

articles.title: Stong's Market brings fresh flavour and designer florals to Surrey
articles.author: Elana Shepert
articles.summary: Stong's Market has opened a new location in Surrey, featuring gourmet groceries, fresh produce, and ready-to-go meals. The new store also includes a smoothie and juice bar and a second location of STEMS by Stong's, offering floral arrangements and giftware.

articles.title: Starbucks Teases New Information On AI Barista
articles.author: Lauren Jarvis-Gibson
articles.summary: Starbucks is introducing 'Green Dot Assist,' a virtual assistant designed to aid baristas in real-time, providing quick access to essential information like seasonal beverage ingredients. Currently being tested in 35 coffeehouses, the AI-driven system aims to streamline barista tasks and enhance customer service, marking a new era of AI-enhanced partner experience at Starbucks.

articles.title: Wyze's New Battery-Powered Doorbell Takes Notes From Google's Latest
articles.summary: Wyze has announced the Wyze Battery Video Doorbell, a budget-friendly doorbell camera. This new product features a rechargeable battery, offering easier installation compared to the previous Video Doorbell v2 released in 2023.

articles.title: Artisia: The shape of food to come
articles.summary: Barilla has created the Artisia brand, which utilizes technology to create previously impossible pasta shapes. This includes new consumption methods and collaborations with premium brands. Artisia's cutting-edge technology employs 36 nozzles, enabling unique formats like the Sea Urchin shape and Spaghetto 3D, while respecting Italian culinary traditions.

articles.title: The M&S Beauty Advent Calendar is a must buy this Christmas
articles.author: Emilia Kettle
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer's has launched their 2025 Beauty Advent Calendar, a £330-worth collection of 25 beauty items, available for £60 with a qualifying purchase. The calendar includes products from brands like Clinique, Estee Lauder, and Living Proof, as well as M&S's own brand items, offering a variety of skincare, haircare, body care, beauty, and fragrance products.

articles.title: WPP Revolutionizes Ad Industry with AI-Powered Marketing Platform
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: WPP has launched WPP Open Pro, an AI-powered platform, designed for brands to independently plan, create, and execute marketing campaigns. This new offering targets smaller brands and existing clients who may not be using full-service agencies, providing them with advanced AI tools.

articles.title: WPP cuts out the agency to help brands create their own ads with AI
articles.author: Paul Sandle
articles.summary: WPP launched WPP Open Pro, a new AI-powered marketing platform, to enable brands to plan, create, and publish their own campaigns. The platform is designed for smaller brands and existing clients, allowing them to create channel-specific ads quickly and publish them directly to major platforms.

articles.title: WPP Launches a Self-Serve Version of Its AI Platform To Court Small Biz Dollars
articles.author: Kendra Barnett
articles.summary: WPP has launched WPP Open Pro, a self-serve, AI-powered marketing platform designed to streamline campaign creation and execution. The platform targets smaller enterprises and existing clients, offering access to professional-grade tools and AI capabilities for generating branded content and deploying campaigns across major ad platforms. It utilizes AI models from Google, OpenAI, and Adobe, and aims to expand WPP's market reach and drive revenue.

articles.title: New Car Wash Approved by South Brunswick Zoning Board
articles.author: Jacob Turchi
articles.summary: Spark Car Wash will construct a 4,481 square foot automated car wash at 3703 US Route 1 in South Brunswick, NJ. The new location will include a drive-through lane and 25 vacuum parking spaces. The existing structure will be demolished to make way for the new car wash.

articles.title: Amazon Launches New AI Shopping Tool in US for the Indecisive
articles.author: Spencer Soper
articles.summary: Amazon has launched 'Help Me Decide,' a new AI-powered tool that recommends products to shoppers based on their purchase history. This feature, available on Amazon's smartphone app and mobile browsers, uses large language models to match purchase history with product descriptions and reviews. Additionally, Walmart has partnered with OpenAI's ChatGPT, enabling shoppers to purchase Walmart products through the chatbot.

articles.title: Amazon launches AI shopping tool for the indecisive
articles.author: Bloomberg
articles.summary: Amazon has launched a new AI-powered tool called "Help Me Decide" that recommends specific products to shoppers overwhelmed with choices, using their shopping history and product information. Additionally, Walmart has partnered with OpenAI's ChatGPT, enabling customers to browse and purchase Walmart products through the chatbot, potentially impacting Amazon's market position.

articles.title: We tried everything on McDonald's new World Heist menu — one item ‘ruined' us
articles.author: Courtney Pochin
articles.summary: McDonald's UK launched new World Heist menu items, including Garlic & Black Pepper McNuggets from Japan, the Pineapple McSpicy from Australia, the Maple Quarter Pounder from Canada, McShaker Fries from Poland, Cheesy sides, Chocolate Caramel Pie from Indonesia, Chocolate McFlurry from Malaysia, and the Sprite Sakura Zero.

articles.title: Uniform Eliminates Months-Long Platform Migrations with Industry-First AI That Works on Any Website
articles.author: Uniform
articles.summary: Uniform unveiled new AI capabilities designed to streamline the creation, optimization, and delivery of digital experiences for brands. This new offering aims to solve digital marketing bottlenecks without requiring platform migrations or vendor lock-in.

articles.title: LG and Ecobank Collaborate to Make Smart Living Affordable and Accessible for Nigerians
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: LG Electronics Nigeria and Ecobank Nigeria have partnered to make LG's AI-powered smart home technology, including Smart TVs and other appliances, more accessible to Nigerian consumers. Ecobank offers a flexible Easy Monthly Instalment scheme, allowing customers to spread the cost of these premium appliances over time. This collaboration aims to democratize technology and enhance comfort, convenience, and efficiency in Nigerian homes.

articles.title: Wyze Unlocks Effortless Security with Its New Battery Video Doorbell
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Wyze launched the Wyze Battery Video Doorbell, a wire-free security solution designed for easy installation and extended battery life. The doorbell features a 150° x 150° viewing angle and 1536 x 1536 HD+ resolution, providing a complete view of the front porch.

articles.title: Amazon's new AI shopping tool tells you why you should buy a recommended product
articles.author: Tech Crunch
articles.summary: Amazon has launched a new 'Help Me Decide' tool. This tool provides personalized recommendations within specific categories, along with reasons supporting the purchase.

articles.title: Stamus Networks Announces Clear NDR Enterprise U42 with Advanced AI Integration and Enhanced Performance
articles.author: Stamus Networks
articles.summary: Stamus Networks released Clear NDR ® Enterprise U42, a new version of their threat detection and response system. The release introduces AI integration capabilities, advanced behavioral analytics, and performance enhancements, positioning Clear NDR as a foundation for AI-powered security operations.

articles.title: Wyze's new battery-powered doorbell takes notes from Google's latest
articles.author: 9to5Google
articles.summary: Wyze launched the Wyze Battery Video Doorbell, a product similar to Google's latest Nest Doorbell. The doorbell is available starting today.

articles.title: Amazon's new AI shopping tool tells you why you should buy a recommended product
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: Amazon launched a new AI-powered feature called 'Help me decide' that suggests products based on a user's browsing and shopping history. The feature will initially stick to the price range you're currently browsing, but it can also suggest cheaper or more expensive items if you choose to see more options. It is available to consumers in the U.S. on the Amazon Shopping app on iOS and Android, and on the web.

articles.title: Totaligent's Omni-Channel Digital Communications Platform Is an All-in-One Marketing Game Changer
articles.author: Totaligent
articles.summary: Totaligent, Inc. is preparing to launch its all-in-one enterprise marketing platform, an AI-powered solution designed to consolidate core marketing channels like Programmatic Advertising, Social Media, Email, SMS, and Push Notifications. The platform features a GPU-accelerated database for real-time analytics and aims to address the growing demand for simplicity and intelligent integration in digital marketing.

articles.title: AdCreative.ai, an Appier Group Company, Launches Mobile App to Put Professional Ad Creation in Everyone's Pocket
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: AdCreative.ai, an Appier Group company, launched its first mobile app. This app allows users to create professional-quality ads by simply taking a photo of their product. It transforms the image into polished ads, UGC-style content, or high-fashion visuals, without requiring designers or complicated tools.

articles.title: Meltwater 2025 Year-End Product Release Delivers Smarter Media Intelligence with New AI Innovations
articles.summary: Meltwater has announced its 2025 Year-End Product Release, which includes new AI tools designed for PR and marketing professionals. These tools offer features like consolidated reporting across media types, transparency into how LLMs represent brands, and AI-driven insights, including an AI teammate named Mira, all to enhance clarity and control over brand narratives.

articles.title: Teads Launches CTV Performance: A New Way to Optimize and Measure Real Outcomes from Connected TV
articles.author: Teads Holding Co.
articles.summary: Teads (NASDAQ: TEAD) has launched the beta version of CTV Performance, a new solution for tracking exposure to action in connected TV (CTV) campaigns outside the US. CTV Performance allows advertisers to track site visits, leads, and sales directly tied to CTV exposure, moving beyond traditional metrics.

articles.title: Plaza Tire Service Adds Beebe, AR Location
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Plaza Tire Service has opened a new location on Center Street in Beebe, Arkansas. This marks the company's 84th location overall and 17th in Arkansas, expanding its tire and automotive services to the Greater Little Rock Metro area. The company previously opened locations in Centerton and Little Rock earlier in 2025.

articles.title: Meltwater 2025 Year-End Product Release Delivers Smarter Media Intelligence with New AI Innovations
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Meltwater announced its 2025 Year-End Product Release, introducing new AI tools. These tools are designed to provide PR and Marketing professionals with enhanced clarity, agility, and control over their narratives. The release addresses the changing media landscape where AI and social media impact brand perception.

articles.title: Alibaba's AI Glasses To Be Priced At $659, Pre-Sale On October 24 On Its E-commerce Platform Tmall: Report
articles.author: Stocktwits Inc
articles.summary: Alibaba is launching Quark AI Glasses, which will be available for pre-sale on Tmall on October 24 for 4,699 yuan (approximately $659.4), with potential discounts bringing the price down to 3,999 yuan. The glasses utilize Alibaba's Qwen large language model and Quark AI assistant, offering features like hands-free calling, music streaming, and real-time language translation, with shipping expected to begin in December.

articles.title: Can AI fix the web AI broke?
articles.summary: New AI-powered browsers like ChatGPT Atlas, Comet by Perplexity, and Neon by Opera are being introduced, offering features such as AI chatbots that can summarize webpages, draft text, and gather personalized information.  These browsers aim to improve the web experience by providing a more streamlined and organized approach to accessing online information compared to traditional search engines like Google.

articles.title: Think you can't afford to run an ethical business? You can't afford not to.
articles.author: Usatoday
articles.summary: PTC assists businesses in harnessing the power of Generative AI by leveraging their product data foundation and embedded AI. This offering aims to provide a practical approach for achieving competitive success.

articles.title: B&M selling £2 'Dubai' sprays that make your home smell 'amazing'
articles.summary: B&M has launched a new range of cleaning products called 'Duoud' originating from the United Arab Emirates. The range includes fabric softeners, air fresheners, washing powders, and candles in scents like oud, rose, and musk.  Shoppers are praising the products for their unique fragrances and affordable prices, leading to a viral sensation on social media.

articles.title: 36 TikTok Products That Have *Stayed* Viral — Because They Actually Work
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: Several companies have launched or highlighted new products. SweatBlock introduced antiperspirant wipes, Gold Bond launched a firming neck and chest cream, and Lottabody featured Coconut Oil Foaming Curl Mousse. Other product introductions include Anua's pore-clearing cleansing oil, Dae Cactus Fruit 3-In-1 Styling Cream, and Lumify Eye Drops, indicating a range of new offerings in the beauty and personal care sector.

articles.title: Toluna's One Million Synthetic Personas Accelerate Ideas And Claims Testing Worldwide - Moving From Research To Decision Intelligence
articles.author: BERNAMA
articles.summary: Toluna has expanded the availability of its AI-driven synthetic personas, a new service for testing product features, to 15 markets and 9 languages. The service, available on the Toluna Start platform, creates realistic personas with detailed profiles to provide human-like responses across studies.

articles.title: B&M's £1.30 sprays 'from Dubai' make your home smell 'absolutely incredible'
articles.author: Charlotte Smith
articles.summary: B&M has launched a new line of cleaning products called 'Duoud,' inspired by Middle Eastern scents. The collection includes air fresheners, laundry detergents, fabric refreshers, and candles with fragrances like oud and rose, and oud and tobacco. Prices range from £1.29 for dryer sheets and fabric refreshers to £4.99 for laundry detergent pods.

articles.title: Platione Launches India's First AI-Enabling B2B Growth Suite for SMEs
articles.author: Press Releases »
articles.summary: Platione, an AI-Ready Growth Suite, has launched as an AI-Enabling B2B Marketplace for SMEs in India. It helps businesses become AI-discoverable by providing AI-optimized websites, mobile apps, marketplace profiles, and lead generation through BOFAI landing pages. The platform also includes an Integrated CRM with lead management and follow-up automation, AI chatbots, and multi-channel marketing automation across WhatsApp, Email, and SMS.

articles.title: Samsung's Galaxy XR doesn't give me much hope for Android XR
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy XR, an Android XR device positioned as a competitor to Apple's Vision Pro, priced at $1,800. It features a design similar to the Vision Pro and aims to deliver immersive experiences with AI integration, however, the device is considered to be lacking in vision and custom-built XR apps.

articles.title: What the Ad Tech Industry Makes of the AdCP Agentic AI Standard
articles.author: exchangewire.com
articles.summary: Ad tech industry members launched the Ad Context Protocol (AdCP). AdCP represents the first open standard for agentic AI in advertising technology. The standard aims to define how AI agents interact with advertising contexts.

articles.title: AliExpress to begin fresh food delivery in Korea
articles.author: 프리즘 기업리포트
articles.summary: AliExpress, under Alibaba Group, has launched a pilot service called AliFresh in South Korea, entering the fresh food delivery market. The service aims to deliver within two days with free shipping for orders over 15,000 won, and AliExpress plans to expand product categories and officially launch AliFresh as a full-scale channel.

articles.title: iQOO Neo11 launch date confirmed, key specs and colors revealed
articles.author: Sunita
articles.summary: iQOO is set to launch the iQOO Neo 11 smartphone in China on October 30, 2025. The Neo 11 will feature a 7,500mAh battery, a 2K display, and will be available in four variants, including a color-changing back panel and a Pixel Orange option.

articles.title: Nubia Z80 Ultra Unveils Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 Chipset with 7,200 mAh Battery Capacity
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Nubia has launched the Z80 Ultra smartphone featuring the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset and a 7,200 mAh battery. The Z80 Ultra supports 120W fast charging and has a 6.8-inch AMOLED display with a 144Hz refresh rate and a triple-camera setup with a 200MP primary sensor.

articles.title: AI is about to upend Google's AdWords cash cow
articles.author: Chris Stokel-Walker
articles.summary: Google is adapting its Google Ads product to integrate with new AI-powered search results, specifically AI Overviews and AI Mode.  This adaptation aims to maintain ad revenue in the face of changing search behaviors, where AI-generated answers might reduce clicks to websites.  The company aims to integrate ads into these new AI discovery surfaces.

articles.title: Future Origins Demonstrates Large Scale Production of Nalo™
articles.author: Future Origins
articles.summary: Future Origins announced the successful completion of a large-scale demonstration campaign of Nalo™, its zero deforestation drop-in replacement for C12/C14 fatty alcohols. The demonstration campaign produced more than 10 tons of in-spec material in an integrated refining facility. This milestone is viewed as a major step forward in its efforts toward a Final Investment Decision (FID) for its first commercial-scale manufacturing plant.

articles.title: Alibaba launches AI chatbot service
articles.author: Reuters
articles.summary: Alibaba launched a new AI chatbot assistant service integrated into its Quark app, enhancing its consumer-facing AI offerings. Powered by Qwen3 models, the service provides real-time information and services via text or voice. Pre-sales for Alibaba's Quark AI Glasses will begin on Tmall, with orders fulfilled from December.

articles.title: Reviewers Swear This Self-Emptying Robot Vacuum Blows The Roomba Out Of The Water — And It's Over $100 Off
articles.author: Marquaysa Battle
articles.summary: Roborock is offering discounted robot vacuums, including self-emptying models that also mop. These vacuums feature smart mapping, customizable no-go zones, and obstacle avoidance. Reviewers praise Roborock for its superior performance and ease of use compared to iRobot's Roomba.

articles.title: 'Thank you to everyone that has supported us': Homegrown Londonderry clothing brand announce opening of a new store
articles.author: Business reporter
articles.summary: Storefront NI, a Londonderry-based clothing brand, is opening a new store at 12-14 Castle Street on October 25th. The launch will feature an exclusive opening-day collection, limited-edition tees, and a live music event.

articles.title: Best foldable and flip phones 2025: Samsung, Google and more - Which?
articles.author: Adam Speight
articles.summary: Samsung, Google, Motorola and OnePlus are competing in the foldable phone market. Samsung released the Galaxy Z Flip7, featuring a larger external screen and Galaxy AI features, and the Galaxy Z Fold7, with an improved folding mechanism and premium cameras. Google released its Pixel Fold with a 7.6-inch main screen and Motorola released Razr 60 Ultra with a 7-inch screen. OnePlus released OnePlus Open similar to Samsung and Google's Fold phones.

articles.title: New HONOR X7d 5G: durability meets AI in budget-friendly smartphone
articles.author: Partnered Content
articles.summary: HONOR is launching the HONOR X7d 5G, a budget-friendly smartphone featuring 5-star drop protection, IP65 water resistance, a 6500mAh battery, and an AI button for enhanced user experience. The phone also boasts a Snapdragon 6s Gen 3 processor, 24GB equivalent RAM and up to 256GB of storage.

articles.title: LG Electronics and Ecobank partner to expand AI ecosystem: From smart TVs to connected home experiences
articles.author: Class
articles.summary: LG Electronics Nigeria and Ecobank Nigeria have partnered to offer LG's AI-powered Smart TVs with Ecobank's Easy Monthly Installment (EMI) scheme. LG introduced its latest lineup of AI Smart TVs, including OLED, QNED, NanoCell, and UHD models powered by LG ThinQ AI. This collaboration aims to make premium smart home experiences affordable and attainable for Nigerians.

articles.title: JoJo Ventures Launches JifChat AI Design Agent
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: JoJo Ventures has launched JifChat, an AI design agent designed for creators to produce visual content. JifChat focuses on visual-first workflows and features tailored representation for Asian creators, including language support and culturally relevant details. The platform offers functionalities like Workflows, Styles, In-Chat Image Interaction, Mockups, and Advanced Model Control and is available with free trials.

articles.title: 2026 Toyota bZ Goes on Sale with Upgraded Convenience Features, Expanded Charging Network Options for ...
articles.author: Borger News-Herald
articles.summary: Toyota's 2026 bZ model offers customers improved driving range and performance, indicating a new or updated product offering.

articles.title: Samsung envisions future of accessibility with appliances
org: Samsung Fire & Marine Insurance Guide Dog School
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics released an AI-powered appliance manual titled 'How to Use for All' to assist people with limited or no vision, enhancing the accessibility of its Bespoke AI Combo Washer-Dryers and other appliances. The manual features screen reader functions, audio explanations, voice controls, and tactile guidance, and is part of Samsung's broader effort to improve usability through inclusive design.

articles.title: Ace Bed (CEO Ahn Sung-ho), Korea's leading bed brand, announced on the 23rd that it has opened a new..
articles.author: Lee Hanna
articles.summary: Ace Bed has launched a new premium experience store, Ace Square Incheon Gyeyang Branch, designed to enhance customer accessibility and convenience. This five-story store features an experience space for the top mattress brand 'ACE HERITZ' and allows customers to compare mattresses in a simulated bedroom environment.

articles.title: Online Laundry Service Market Report 2025, with Profiles of Urban Company, LaundryGenius, Press Technologies, Rinse, Washmen, and Other Major and Innovative Companies
articles.author: Research
articles.summary: LG Electronics India launched a new self-laundry service in February 2024, targeting the education sector. This service includes LG's connected commercial washing machines and dryers, enabling users to operate them via an app-based interface and the creation of 200 self-laundry centers starting with Galgotias University, modernizing student living facilities with a $4 million investment.

articles.title: Aldi's viral 'buy to save' £35 gadget back in stores that's 'perfect for winter'
articles.author: Charlotte Smith
articles.summary: Aldi is reintroducing its heated airer range, including the Winged Heated Airer for £34.99 and the Upright Heated Airer for £79.99, starting October 26. These energy-efficient devices offer a quick and cost-effective laundry solution compared to tumble dryers. Aldi claims shoppers can save 50% versus comparable products.

articles.title: Unlock the Power of ChatGPT: Explore New Prompting Packages for Enhanced Work Efficiency
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: OpenAI has introduced new ChatGPT prompt packs designed to boost productivity by providing pre-designed templates that facilitate the integration of generative AI into professional tasks. These packages offer convenient templates for various business-related activities such as writing emails, summarizing documents, and brainstorming solutions. Users can leverage these templates to improve their prompting skills and enhance their interaction with AI, emphasizing the importance of interactive collaboration and careful scrutiny of AI-generated responses.

articles.title: Alibaba launches AI chatbot service in renewed consumer push
articles.author: Hong Kong Standard
articles.summary: Alibaba launched a new AI chatbot assistant service. This launch represents a new product offering from the company.

articles.title: Success of Bradford-based online retailer Hungry Bazaar
articles.author: Helen Mead
articles.summary: Hungry Bazaar started selling products like kitchen, garden and pet supplies on Temu in October 2024 and generated almost £300k in sales. Some of the best selling products are the 50m rotary washing line, pet food storage bins and the solar crystal chandelier light.

articles.title: The Co-Founder Question: Can Agentic AI Build And Run A Company Without Humans?
articles.author: Sahar Hashmi
articles.summary: Klarna deployed an AI assistant handling customer service, managing millions of conversations. Microsoft integrated AI agents into Microsoft 365 Copilot suite to automate tasks. Cognition Labs introduced Devin, an AI software engineer that can plan tasks, write code, test and debug software, and even deploy it.

articles.title: Krystal Designs Marketing Expands with Innovative EnquiryOS System Promising Predictable Growth for Law Firms
articles.summary: Krystal Designs Marketing has launched EnquiryOS, an integrated system designed to help professional services firms with lead generation.  EnquiryOS combines elements like SEO, pay-per-click ads, and website design into a unified approach to generate client enquiries. The system is designed to deliver predictable growth.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 is launching next week, here are 15 things you need to know about it
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching the OnePlus 15 in China on October 27th, featuring a 6.78-inch 1.5K AMOLED display with a 165Hz refresh rate, Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC, and a triple-rear camera setup with 50-megapixel sensors. The device also includes a 7,300mAh battery with 120W wired and 50W wireless charging support, along with a Glacier cooling system and a dedicated G2 gaming network chip.

articles.title: Travelsoft now provides global access to Lufthansa Group's full NDC content
articles.author: Travel Daily News
articles.summary: Travelsoft's Transport Hub now offers Lufthansa Group's full NDC content, granting direct access to fares, ancillaries, and NDC-exclusive products. This integration enhances the capabilities of Travelsoft's service.

articles.title: Prompt Engineering Is Dipping Into Those Newly Released ChatGPT Work-Boosting Prompting Packages
articles.author: Lance Eliot
articles.summary: OpenAI has released ChatGPT work-boosting prompting packs, providing ready-made templates to enhance generative AI use for work-related tasks. These templates, available for business-savvy topics, aim to facilitate root cause analysis and other business processes by offering templated prompts. Users can import these templates into ChatGPT and engage in interactive dialogues with the AI to refine results.

articles.title: Alibaba introduces AI chatbot in consumer market push
articles.summary: Alibaba has launched a new AI chatbot assistant service integrated into its Quark app, offering real-time information and services through text or voice conversations. Additionally, Alibaba announced the pre-sale of Quark AI Glasses, priced at 4,699 yuan ($660), strengthening its position in wearable tech and demonstrating commitment to integrating AI into consumer products.

articles.title: BELLAME BEAUTY INTRODUCES THE OMNI MARKETING OPPORTUNITY, A FIRST-OF-ITS-KIND MODEL REDEFINING MODERN ENTREPRENEURSHIP
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: BELLAME BEAUTY introduces the Omni Marketing Opportunity, a business model uniting affiliate marketing, influencer reach, and direct selling. This ecosystem empowers individuals to build businesses with no financial risk, providing tools like a digital boutique, content, and support.

articles.title: BELLAME BEAUTY INTRODUCES THE OMNI MARKETING OPPORTUNITY, A FIRST-OF-ITS-KIND MODEL REDEFINING MODERN ENTREPRENEURSHIP
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: BELLAME BEAUTY has introduced the Omni Marketing Opportunity, a new business model uniting affiliate marketing, influencer reach, and direct selling. This platform empowers individuals to build their businesses with no enrollment fees, monthly costs, or required purchases. Each Brand Partner receives a personalized digital boutique, content, marketing systems, and corporate support.

articles.title: Amazon Launches Smart Glasses and AI Robots to Speed Up Deliveries
articles.author: Khaama Press
articles.summary: Amazon introduced new AI-driven smart glasses and robotic systems designed to improve delivery times and boost efficiency. These new delivery technologies were unveiled as part of the company's efforts to accelerate deliveries.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: Meet the candidates for Urbandale school board
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: T-Mobile has invested billions to improve its mobile network, from big cities to small towns. Ookla Speedtest recognizes T-Mobile as America's best mobile network in the US. They are thanked for supporting communities and keeping them connected.

articles.title: Xu Xu's Dumplings Food Truck Is Austin's Next Hit!
articles.summary: Xu Xu's Dumplings is officially opening its food truck on October 24, 2025, at 1234 East 6th Street, Austin, TX 78702. The food truck offers handmade dumplings with a modern twist and plans to expand to additional Austin neighborhoods in 2026. The grand opening celebration will allow guests to enjoy freshly made dumplings and meet the founders.

articles.title: Chris Ryan and Harry Llufrio on What T8 Co-Create Means for In-House Creativity
articles.author: McGill
articles.summary: T8 Creations launched T8 Co-Create, a new service designed to support in-house design teams through mentorship and collaboration. This initiative aims to strengthen internal creative capabilities while keeping teams connected to industry trends, bridging the gap between in-house knowledge and external perspectives.

articles.title: Totogi generates 500,000 lines of production BSS Code in one day—live
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Totogi is showcasing its BSS Magic platform at TelecomTV's AI-Native Telco Forum by building a complete BSS from scratch in one day. A single Totogi engineer is constructing five core modules, including CRM, product catalog, and revenue management, generating 500,000 lines of production-quality code in real-time using AI.

articles.title: HONOR launches the unbreakable AI smartphone HONOR X9d 5G delivering toughness, power, and innovation in one sleek package
articles.author: Partner Content
articles.summary: HONOR launched the HONOR X9d 5G smartphone, emphasizing its durability with a Guinness World Record for drop resistance. The phone features an 8,300mAh battery, a 108MP camera, and AI-powered tools, and is available for pre-order in the UAE from October 24-30 with exclusive gifts.

articles.title: FullThrottle Technologies Unveils AI-Powered Automotive DSP for Tierless Marketing
articles.author: Timothy Alexander
articles.summary: FullThrottle Technologies, LLC launched The Automotive DSP™, a generative AI-driven demand-side platform tailored for the automotive industry. This platform is built on fullthrottle.ai and aims to streamline digital advertising by integrating first-party data, real-time attribution, and AI-powered automation to improve campaign outcomes like vehicle sales and service appointments.

articles.title: IAG, Adobe Team Up to Boost Growth via Personalisation
articles.author: Mirage News
articles.summary: Adobe is committed to helping organizations bring creativity, marketing, and AI together to orchestrate customer experiences. This partnership aims to unify customer data from multiple systems to proactively engage customers, offering tailored experiences.

articles.title: The Pixi Story: From London Boutique to Cult Brand
articles.summary: Pixi, a beauty brand, is celebrating 26 years of radiance, authenticity and innovation. The brand began as a small boutique near Carnaby Street and has grown into a globally acclaimed brand.

articles.title: The Future Starts Now: AI Dual Inverter Washer & Dryer Set L9 Debuts at Canton Fair
articles.author: Shuzhi Society
articles.summary: Dreame is showcasing its new washing solutions at the 138th Canton Fair, including the L9 washer & dryer set with a bionic robotic knob making its global debut. The product line aims to meet the diverse needs of modern households, also featuring the P55 handwash washer & dryer set, and the MilkTab mini washer-dryer designed for baby wear.

articles.title: Singapore's first AI-powered brand consultant: BrandsBuilder.ai Selected to Showcase at Tech in Asia Indonesia 2025
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: BrandsBuilder.ai, an AI-powered brand consultant, is showcasing at the Tech in Asia Conference Indonesia 2025. The platform integrates brand audit, analysis, identity development, and rollout, streamlining the brand-building process for startups and SMEs. It offers features such as brand audit, brand analysis, brand recommendations, and AI content generation to ensure brand consistency.

articles.title: Not only Kaufland, Lidl and Co. Are Looking Closely – Next Hype About Kitchen Appliances at Aldi?
articles.author: derwesten.de
articles.summary: Aldi will soon be offering a new kitchen appliance for sale. This follows similar product presentations from companies like Action, Ninja, and Amazon.

articles.title: Eco-Products wins award for reusable containers
articles.author: Biz West staff
articles.summary: Eco-Products, a Novolex brand, won the 2025 Balpex Innovation Center Award. This recognition was given for its Veda reusable containers.

articles.title: Eco-Products wins award for reusable containers
articles.author: Bizwest Staff
articles.summary: Eco-Products, a Novolex brand, received the 2025 Balpex Innovation Center Award for its Veda reusable containers. This recognition highlights the company's product innovation in sustainable food-service packaging with its Veda line.

articles.title: Tyra Banks reveals what her viral hot ice cream actually is
articles.author: Ella McIlveen
articles.summary: Tyra Banks launched her ice cream brand SMiZE & DREAM in Sydney, featuring a flagship store in Darling Harbour. The brand partnered with Uber Eats to offer delivery services, and introduced a new product called 'Hot Mama,' a drinkable ice cream. The SMiZE & DREAM ice cream includes a SMiZE surprise at the bottom of every tub, to inspire you to dig deeper and work harder like Tyra's mum.

articles.title: Ooredoo and Mursi United Company: ESG-as-a-Service to Accelerate Sector-Wide Sustainability
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Ooredoo, in partnership with Mursi United Company, launched ESG-as-a-Service. This service aims to support organizations in achieving their goals.

articles.title: The all-new BYD eMax 9 DM-i is now in PH with a P2.678-M starting price
articles.summary: BYD Cars Philippines launched the BYD eMax 9 DM-i, a new plug-in hybrid van, at the Philippine Electric Vehicle Summit. The eMax 9 DM-i features a 1.5-liter turbo generator, a 36.6kWh BYD Blade Battery, and a front-mounted electric motor producing 267hp and 315Nm of torque and is available in two variants: Advance (P2,678,000) and Premium (P2,998,000).

articles.title: The best Dyson dupes in Australia for hair, home, and air
articles.author: Chanelle Mansour
articles.summary: Shark, Dreame, and Revlon offer budget-friendly alternatives to Dyson's hair tools, providing salon-worthy results without the premium price. Shark and Dreame also compete in the vacuum market with strong suction and smart features. Philips, Coway, and Levoit offer affordable air purifiers that rival Dyson, focusing on maintaining fresh homes while remaining budget-conscious.

articles.title: You Really Have to Lie Down on a Mattress... Ace Bed Opens Experiential Store in Incheon Gyeyang
articles.author: Lee Han-Na
articles.summary: Ace Bed has launched its new large-scale premium experiential store, 'Ace Square Incheon Gyeyang Branch,' in Incheon. The store features ten mattress experience zones, including the premium 'Royal Ace' mattresses and 'ACE HERITZ' brand, alongside new products like the 'Flora' mattress and 'BARONT' bed.

articles.title: LG JOINS SDVERSE TO ACCELERATE SOFTWARE-DEFINED MOBILITY INNOVATION
articles.author: LG Electronics
articles.summary: LG Electronics has launched its LG AlphaWare suite of software solutions on the SDVerse marketplace. This initiative aims to assist automakers and suppliers in their transition to software-defined vehicles.

articles.title: BYD's big product plan to take over Australia revealed
articles.author: David Mccowen
articles.summary: BYD is introducing several new car models in Australia, including the Atto 1, Atto 2, Sealion 5, and Sealion 8, along with two luxury hybrids from their Denza spin-off, the B5 and B8. The Atto 1 is expected to be the most affordable EV in the nation, while Denza aims to disrupt the luxury four-wheel-drive market with plug-in hybrid powertrains and off-road capabilities.

articles.title: The best-selling Dyson V15 Cordless Vacuum Cleaner is an unbelievable $600 off right now
articles.author: Ariana Pezeshki
articles.summary: Dyson is offering a significant discount on its V15 Detect Absolute Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, reducing the price by $600 at Amazon Australia. The V15 features advanced technology, including laser dust detection and automatic power adjustment, and delivers up to 60 minutes of suction. It includes multiple cleaner heads and tools for various cleaning needs.

articles.title: Kraken extends reach into Australia through first-of-a-kind partnership with network owner
articles.author: Renew Economy
articles.summary: The deal marks the launch of Kraken Distribution.

articles.title: CoreWeave Empowers AI With High-Speed, Flexible Object Storage
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: CoreWeave is offering a specialized object storage platform. This offering is designed for the rapid pace and scale of AI advancement. It signals a shift away from generic object storage solutions.

articles.title: Introducing Galaxy XR: Opening New Worlds
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics has unveiled Galaxy XR, a new category of AI-native devices. This product is designed to deliver immersive experiences in a form factor optimized.

articles.title: Lenovo goes tiny as it embraces AMD-based Ryzen mini PCs - including one offering venerable ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Lenovo introduces its ThinkCentre neo 55 lineup, which combines AI capabilities, a small form factor, and eco-friendly design. The new Lenovo ThinkCentre neo 55 targets modern business computing needs while remaining affordable.

articles.title: There is room, but only for brands that can solve real problems users face, says Madhav Sheth of Ai+ smartphone
articles.author: Rakesh Kumar
articles.summary: Ai+ smartphone, a new smartphone brand founded by NxtQuantum Shift Technologies, launched with the aim of providing innovative, transparent, and inclusive technology. The first Ai+ smartphone targets first-time smartphone buyers and those seeking reliable devices, focusing on a clean interface and privacy. The brand aims to expand into mid and premium ranges while maintaining value and accessibility.

articles.title: Maya launches stock investing feature
articles.author: Manila Standard
articles.summary: Maya Philippines Inc. has introduced a new stock to the market. This launch signifies an expansion of the company's offerings.

articles.title: How To Access Android Updates Early On Your Google Pixel Phone
articles.author: BGR
articles.summary: Google is providing early access to new Android OS updates for Google Pixel users. Users can experience upcoming Android features before the official release by learning how to safely access these updates.

articles.title: Amazon's latest attempt at selling stuff with AI is the ‘Help me decide' button
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Amazon is launching a new AI-powered tool called 'Help me decide'. This tool, available on Amazon's app and mobile website, picks a product for users based on their browsing activity, searches, shopping history, and preferences.

articles.title: B&M shoppers 'obsessed' with �4 perfumes that are similar to �80 luxury brand
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: A company offers five different scents, each featuring a different colored bottle designed to match various moods.

articles.title: Test Driving The 2026 Volvo ES90: High-Tech Long Range Swedish Luxury
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Volvo's ES90 sedan is a technology flagship. The sedan promises comfort, space, performance, and great electric range.

articles.title: Stamus Networks Announces Clear NDR Enterprise U42 with Advanced AI Integration and Enhanced Performance
articles.author: Canada Newswire
articles.summary: Stamus Networks has launched Clear NDR® Enterprise U42, a new network-based threat detection and response system. This release features AI integration and advanced behavioral analytics, marking a significant advancement in threat detection.

articles.title: Aldi just launched its own £16.99 rival to Ring's battery video doorbell – and it's ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Aldi introduced a new budget video doorbell. The doorbell features two-way talking, water and dust resistance, and SD card support for footage storage.

articles.title: Stock investing feature added to Maya app
articles.author: The Manila Times
articles.summary: MAYA Philippines Inc. has launched a new feature within its app allowing subscribers to participate in initial public offerings (IPOs). Users can subscribe through partner brokers DragonFi Securities Inc. and F. Yap Securities Inc., beginning with Maynilad Water Services Inc.'s IPO.

articles.title: Karnataka IT-BT minister Kharge proposes CoE for railways, mobility innovation in state
articles.author: The Economic Times
articles.summary: Nova Control Tecnologix launched a new unit in Bengaluru. The launch event included a speech by a minister and mention of Kavach.

articles.title: Anthropic Expands Google Cloud Partnership to Access 1 Million Chips
articles.author: Wall Street Journal
articles.summary: An AI company will collaborate with Google Cloud to train the next generations of its AI model Claude and will also have access to additional services. The AI company first announced the collaboration in 2023.

articles.title: shozerTV Archives
articles.summary: New Metric Media is launching a new direct-to-consumer YouTube channel. This channel will feature comedy across scripted and unscripted series, podcasts, stand-up specials, and sketch content.
